Text: As always, your kindness is greatly appreciated. For anyone who is interested, this is a True PDF - lovely quality and fully searchable.
Cheers Thor. It wasn't TOO long ago when I was the one who was taking these magazines off your account ;)
raymond_u, my source dried up so I'm very grateful you have taken over!
Thor - quite a few people still look to your account though; and some ask whether or not you will upload these in the future
